titles.title: COINTELPRO Full Disclosure Act
COINTELPRO Full Disclosure Act
To require the public disclosure of COINTELPRO records, to establish a COINTELPRO Records Collection, and to establish the COINTELPRO Records Review Board, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
